name: Harald's Adventure
description:
What is this?

Harald's Adventure is the first game I've created with the Defold Engine. It was meant to be a Training/Test but it turned out to be actually hard and fun to play. It has only 7 levels but it gets insanely hard.  I was never able to finish Insane Mode, it's just too hard. 

How do I play this?

Just use your arrow keys or W A D. Your player cannot move downwards so plan your movements! Everything kills you except the objective, a blinking block, and the exit. You must carry the objective to the exit to proceed to the next level. I recommend Casual Mode to learn the mechanics before you play normal mode. In normal mode, you get sent 1 level back if you lose all your 5 hearts.

Downloads

I'll bundle the game to all platforms as soon as I am done with it.

Where to play?

Play it in your browser here at itch.io or at https://hyper-tech.ch/Harald

Feel free to suggest things I could add in the future!
